channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scoop: Bannon quietly making moves toward 2028 run
item.description: Former Trump White House adviser Steve Bannon is laying the groundwork for a 2028 run for president, two people familiar with his thinking tell Axios....

item.title: "Pink cocaine" is spreading in U.S. — and users don't know what's in it
item.description: A drug marketed as "pink cocaine" is turning up more often in U.S. nightclubs and busts, alarming health officials because it's usually not cocaine at...

item.title: Gen Z isn't quiet quitting. They're side hustling
item.description: The days of quiet quitting are over. Gen Z is navigating today's tough job market with side gigs. Why it matters: Over half of Gen Z (57%) now have a ...

item.title: U.S. oil giants tell Trump they're noncommittal on Venezuela
item.description: U.S. oil giants signaled interest in Venezuela on Friday but stopped well short of committing to massive and rapid new investments there during a meet...

item.title: Feds bashed for "shocking" lockdown of Minneapolis ICE shooting probe
item.description: Former prosecutors and criminal defense attorneys are alarmed by the Trump administration's "highly unusual" decision to kick local investigators off ...

item.title: Banks criticize Trump’s push for 10 percent credit card interest rate cap
item.description: Financial institutions and other credit card issuers say the cap, which the president wants in effect by Jan. 20, would limit consumers’ access to cre...

item.title: Trump’s Venezuela plan lures investors with oil, minerals — and risk
item.description: U.S. firms are looking for ways into Venezuela as the White House puts out the call.

item.title: A majority in name only? House Republicans barely hanging on
item.description: Moves to Trump administration, resignations and deaths leave GOP without a functional majority.

item.title: Trump’s 2026 affordability message competes with foreign policy push
item.description: President Donald Trump has made clear that he has no plans to back down from a growing list of foreign entanglements.

item.title: Here are the agencies that were cut the most by Trump, new data shows
item.description: About 335,000 federal workers left government from January to November 2025, with a vast majority of those people quitting or retiring.

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Trump will again test ‘blame Democrats’ message on the economy — this time at a casino
item.description: President Donald Trump will give a speech in Northeastern Pennsylvania on Tuesday, the first stop in a ‘tour’ where he will talk about affordability c...

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
